Corporate advantages.
You can place into the system the following items of business information:
General information: company type, chief date of establishment.
Address.
Main industries: choose yours.
Groups of goods and services.
Define distinguishing features.(up to 4000 characters)
Tell about your business (up to 8000 characters)
Corporate web sites.
Representatives list: names, positions, e-mail, phones.
Finance information. Show the sales and income growth.
Trademarks your company is using.
Clients and customers.
Company's Logo or main Trademark graphic file 18K JPG, GIF.
We accept Your weekly Press-releasees with Photo 18K JPG, GIF.
Provide info on subsidiaries and branches in a similar way with one member's account.

Add, update, change items of your business information in opportune moment.
Easy to operate from member's area. Friendly interface.

Keep it in reserve and let business world know why your positions are unique. This promotion program allows to identify what your products and services are & where they are exactly.

The info you will place in the system is searchable for all users and members of the 1GARD . 1GARD makes this info available even for those clients who are using non Internet services.

For example: Our client has requested to find out certain services in a certain market segment, in a certain region for business relationship. First of all we'll provide him with info which complies with the requirements. Well positioned companies or organizations will take place in the first lines of the report.

Also your company will have an opportunity to post the Press-releasees through this promotion program. The distinguishing feature of this service is the PHOTO you can attach. Strict requirement: All the news must be important, related to your activity & business. They can be placed in Business News & will be searchable for audience by keywords. The most interesting of them will be linked to 1GARD head lines (on decision of the editorial board).
